title: Mapping Misconduct: NYPD Complaint Trends (1985–2019)
description: Interactive map of civilian complaints against the NYPD from 1985–2019 at the precinct level, allowing users to explore how complaint patterns changed over time and which areas experienced the highest concentration of reports.

title: Complaints Surge Among Young Officers
description: Persuasive or Deceptive? Two opposing visualizations built to show how visual design, framing, and data transformation can be used to either support or undermine a proposition — even when both visualizations are based on the same underlying data.

title: Portfolio
description: A growing data science portfolio showcasing analytical, visualization, and research projects developed during graduate study and beyond.

title: NYC Yellow Taxi Fare Prediction
description: Predicting NYC Yellow Taxi fares using large-scale trip data and a tuned LightGBM model.

title: Car Value Predictor
description: A machine learning based tool that predicts used car prices from key features such as make, model, year, mileage, and trim. Built as a full data science pipeline: from web scraping and model development to an interactive dashboard for real-time vehicle value estimation.
